mapper.select: SELECT s.stay_name, s.location, date_format(r.check_in_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS check_in_date, date_format(r.check_out_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS check_out_date, date_format(p.modified_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS modified_date, (datediff(r.check_out_date, r.check_in_date) + 1) AS days_count, p.plan_id FROM planner p JOIN reservation r ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id JOIN room_info ro ON r.room_id = ro.room_id JOIN stay_info s ON ro.stay_id = s.stay_id WHERE r.user_id = #{user_id};
SELECT * FROM detail_plan WHERE plan_id = #{plan_id} AND plan_date = #{check_in_date} ORDER BY plan_start_time, plan_end_time;
mapper.update: UPDATE planner SET modified_date = now() WHERE plan_id = #{plan_id};
